## CRAN packages

- [`ppseq`](http://www.emilyzabor.com/ppseq/) (author), a package of functions to design clinical trials with sequential predictive probability monitoring for futility

- [`riskclustr`](https://www.emilyzabor.com/riskclustr/) (author), a package of functions for the study of etiologic heterogeneity

- [`gtsummary`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/) (contributor) a package for creating presentation-ready summary tables


## Github packages

- [`ezfun`](https://www.emilyzabor.com/ezfun/), a package of personal utility functions to generate tables for use in R Markdown reports

- [`condsurv`](https://www.emilyzabor.com/condsurv/), a package for conditional survival analysis
